units.name: Archon
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: splinter pistol; huskblade.

profiles.name: Archon
profiles.invulnerable_description: You cannot re-roll invulnerable saving throws made for this model. The first time an invulnerable saving throw made for this model is failed, until the end of the battle, this model has no invulnerable saving throw.

units.name: Succubus
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Succubus weapons.

datasheet.name: Storm of Blades
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Combat Drugs
datasheet.description: If this model is Empowered in the Fight phase, then until the end of the phase, models in this model’s unit, have the Fights First ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Lelith Hesperax
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Lelith’s blades.

datasheet.name: Thrilling Spectacle
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. When it does, until the end of the phase, the Attacks characteristic of Lelith’s blades is increased to 12 and this model’s invulnerable save is increased to 3+.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Brides of Death
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability, and each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Haemonculus
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: stinger pistol; Haemonculus tools and scissorhands.

datasheet.name: Master of Pain
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Fear Incarnate (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 1 from that test.|Datasheet||
000000642|1|000008338||||Core|4+|
000000642|2|000008346||||Core||
000000642|3|000008507||||Faction||
000000642|4|||Fleshcraft|At the end of your Movement phase, this model can heal one friendly CRONOS, TALOS, GROTESQUES or WRACKS unit within 6". If it does, one model in that unit regains up to 3 lost wounds (if you selected a WRACKS unit, up to 3 destroyed models are returned to that unit instead).|Datasheet||

units.name: Urien Rakarth
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Casket of Flensing; Haemonculus tools and scissorhands.

datasheet.name: Horrific Regeneration
datasheet.description: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.|Datasheet||

units.name: Drazhar
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: the Executioner’s demiklaives.

datasheet.name: Master of Blades
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Vicious Execution
datasheet.description: Once per battle, when this model’s unit is selected to fight, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [PRECISION] ability, and each time an enemy CHARACTER model is destroyed by this model, you gain D3 Pain tokens. If that destroyed CHARACTER model was the enemy Warlord, you gain 3 Pain tokens instead.|Datasheet||

units.name: Kabalite Warriors
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: splinter rifle; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Phantasm Grenade Launcher
datasheet.description: The bearer’s unit has the Grenades keyword.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Sadistic Raiders
datasheet.description: If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase, and this unit (or any TRANSPORT it is embarked within) is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under you control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Wyches
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: splinter pistol; Hekatarii blade.

profiles.name: Wyches
profiles.invulnerable_description: *  The invulnerable save that models in this unit have is improved to a 4+ against melee attacks.

datasheet.name: No Escape
datasheet.description: Each time an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army with this ability is selected to Fall Back, models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Phantasm Grenade Launcher
datasheet.description: The bearer’s unit has the Grenades keyword.|Wargear||

units.name: Incubi
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: klaive.

datasheet.name: Tormentors
datasheet.description: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||

units.name: Mandrakes
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: baleblast; glimmersteel blade.

datasheet.name: Fade Away
datasheet.description:
At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove this unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If the battle ends and this unit is not on the battlefield, it is destroyed.|Datasheet||
000000650|1|000008338||||Core|5+|
000000650|2|000008507||||Faction||
000000650|3|||The Torturer’s Craft|Each time this unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Pain token. When this unit is destroyed, you gain 1 Pain token.|Datasheet||
000000651|1|000008338||||Core|5+|
000000651|2|000008507||||Faction||
000000651|3|||Mindless Killing Machines|Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; that destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and it is then removed from play.|Datasheet||
000000652|1|000008344||||Core|9"

units.name: Wracks
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Wrack blades.

units.name: Grotesques
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: monstrous weapons.

units.name: Beastmaster
units.loadout: The Beastmaster is equipped with: splinter pods; agoniser. Every Clawed Fiend is equipped with: Clawed Fiend fists. Every Khymerae is equipped with: Khymerae talons. Every Razorwing Flock is equipped with: Razorwing feathers.

datasheet.name: Beastmaster
datasheet.description: While this unit contains a Beastmaster model, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for this unit, and each time a BEAST model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Raider
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: dark lance; bladevanes.

datasheet.name: Aethersails
datasheet.description:
Each time this model Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model.|Datasheet||
000000657|1|000008339||||Core|1|
000000657|2|000008343||||Core||
000000657|3|000008334||||Core|6|
000000657|4|000008337||||Core||
000000657|5|000008507||||Faction||
000000657|6|||Athletic Aerialists|At the end of the Fight phase, if there are no models currently embarked within this Transport, you can select one friendly DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit that has 6 or fewer models that is wholly within 6" of this TRANSPORT (you cannot select a GROTESQUES unit or a unit that can FLY). Unless that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can embark within this Transport.|Datasheet||

units.name: Venom
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: splinter cannon; twin splinter rifle; bladevanes.

units.name: Reavers
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: splinter pistol; splinter rifle; bladevanes.

datasheet.name: Eviscerating Fly-by
datasheet.description: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that it moved over during that move. If you do, roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Grav-talon
datasheet.description: The bearer’s melee weapons have the [LANCE] ability.|Wargear||

wargear.name: Cluster Caltrops
wargear.description: Each time you roll to inflict wounds using this unit’s Eviscerating Fly-by ability, you can re-roll one D6 for each model in this unit equipped with cluster caltrops.

units.name: Hellions
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: splinter pods; hellglaive.

datasheet.name: Hit and Run
datasheet.description: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Phantasm Grenade Launcher
datasheet.description: The bearer’s unit has the Grenades keyword.|Wargear||

units.name: Razorwing Jetfighter
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 dark lances; Razorwing missiles; twin splinter rifle; bladed wings.

datasheet.name: Ground Attack Craft
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding units that can Fly), add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Voidraven Bomber
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 void lances; bladed wings.

datasheet.name: Void Mine
datasheet.description:
Once per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy model it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each enemy unit within D6" of that enemy model: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||
000000662|1|000008343||||Core||
000000662|2|000008507||||Faction||
000000662|3|||Winged Strike|In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.|Datasheet||

units.name: Scourges
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: shardcarbine; close combat weapon.

units.name: Talos
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: twin splinter cannon; 2 macro-scalpels.

datasheet.name: Pain Engine
datasheet.description: If this unit destroys an enemy unit, until the end of the battle, it is Empowered.|Datasheet||

units.name: Cronos
units.loadout: Every Cronos is equipped with: spirit syphon; spirit-leech tentacles.

datasheet.name: Pain Parasite (Aura)
datasheet.description:
Each time one Pain token is removed from your Pain token pool to Empower one or more units, if one or more of those Empowered units are within 9" of this unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Pain token.|Datasheet||
000000665|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000665|2|000008343||||Core||
000000665|3|000008507||||Faction||
000000665|4|||Eradicate the Foe|Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is at its Starting Strength, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, this ability only applies if the target has its starting number of wounds.|Datasheet||
000000666|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000666|2|000008343||||Core||
000000666|3|000008507||||Faction||
000000666|4|||Eradicate the Foe|Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is at its Starting Strength, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the target unit has a Starting Strength of 1, this ability only applies if that unit has its starting number of wounds.|Datasheet||
000000667|1|000008339||||Core|D6|
000000667|2|000008343||||Core||

000000680|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000680|2|000008377||||Faction||
000000680|3|||Vox-net|Each time this model issues an Order, it can issue it to an eligible unit up to 12" away.|Datasheet||

datasheet.description: While this unit contains one or more Lhamaean models, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Medusae
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if any of those attacks made with its eyeburst scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that INFANTRY unit must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Sslyth
datasheet.description: While this unit contains one or more Sslyth models, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Ur-ghul
datasheet.description: While this unit contains one or more Ur-ghul models, this unit has the Fights First ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: COURT OF THE ARCHON
datasheet.description: In the Declare Battle Formations step, this unit can join one KABALITE WARRIORS unit from your army that is being led by an ARCHON (a KABALITE WARRIORS unit cannot have more than one COURT OF THE ARCHON unit joined to it). If it does, until the end of the battle, every model in this unit counts as part of that KABALITE WARRIORS unit, and its Starting Streng|Special (правая колонка)||

units.loadout: This model is equipped with: shrieker cannon; Jester’s blade.

units.loadout: This model is equipped with: shuriken pistol; miststave.

units.name: Solitaire
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Solitaire weapons.

datasheet.name: Blur of Movement
datasheet.description: This model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: PATH OF DAMNATION
datasheet.description: This model cannot be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Troupe Master
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: shuriken pistol; Troupe Master’s blade.

datasheet.name: Cegorach’s Favour
datasheet.description: Once per turn, when you use a Fate dice to substitute a Hit roll, a Wound roll or a saving throw made for this model, you can first change the result of that Fate dice to a 6.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Choreographer of War
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: TROUPE MASTER
datasheet.description: If this model is your Warlord, TROUPE units from your army have the BATTLELINE keyword.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Starweaver
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 shuriken cannons; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Rapid Embarkation
datasheet.description:
At the end of the Fight phase, if there are no models currently embarked within this TRANSPORT, you can select one friendly HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit that has 6 or fewer models that is wholly within 6" of this TRANSPORT. Unless that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can embark within this TRANSPORT.|Datasheet||
000003867|1|000008445||||Faction||
000003867|2|000008339||||Core|D3|
000003867|3|||Arcane Cover|Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.|Datasheet||
000003867|4|||Webway Strike|Each time a friendly AELDARI unit arrives from Strategic Reserves, you can choose to set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within 6" of this FORTIFICATION. If you do, that AELDARI unit can be set up within 9" of enemy models, and can be set up within Engagement Range of enemy models. If an AELDARI unit is set up within Engagement Range of any enemy models in this way, it counts as having made a Charge move this turn and is eligible to fight this turn.|Datasheet||
000003867|5|||Fortification|While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.|Datasheet||
000003867|6|||DEPLOYMENT|Both Wraithbone Arches of this FORTIFICATION must be set up with their upper points no more than 1" apart and with both statues facing in fully opposite directions so that an arch is formed, as shown on the right. Both arches are then treated as a single model for all rules purposes.|Special (правая колонка)||
